MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in North Road and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 6:23PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7:25PM on Sunday 20t6h December 2020
